scripts.cap:android: npm run build && cap sync android && cap open android
scripts.cap:ios: npm run build && cap sync ios && cap open ios
scripts.apk:debug: npm run build && cap sync android && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.apk:release: npm run build && cap sync android && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.aab:release: npm run build && cap sync android && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease
